mapper.sql: id, route_name, route_code, first_time, last_time, price_base, start_stop_name, end_stop_name, nearest_stop_name, nearest_stop_duration, nearest_stop_distance, update_time, create_time
mapper.insert: replace into route (route_name, route_code, first_time, last_time, price_base, start_stop_name, end_stop_name, nearest_stop_name, nearest_stop_duration, nearest_stop_distance) values (#{routeName}, #{routeCode}, #{firstTime}, #{lastTime}, #{priceBase}, #{startStopName}, #{endStopName}, #{nearestStopName}, #{nearestStopDuration}, #{nearestStopDistance})
